Review.Contenu: My son asked for the canyon keycaps for his birthday and the product is probably very good, but it is $100 to ship to the UK. I didn't realise until I put the order through so immediately cancelled as that's just too much money. I was then charged 5.5% processing fee on orders over $100. The cost of the product wasn't over $100. It was the shipping that was. It was very disappointing.

Review.Titre: The delivery was late but the product…
Review.Contenu: The delivery was late but the product is perfect

The desk mat was everything I ordered and looks great, I did have trouble getting my item though as my package was lost in shipping for a few days, I’m sure it’s not this company’s fault but if I could order from here through a different shipping company I would choose to do so
Shipping was fairly quick. I ordered the black canyon keycaps for $75 and they look navy when it’s bright. Other than that I can tell they are well built. Just wish they were actually black.

Amazing company! The colors are vibrant & they don’t fade after long term use. The mousepads are durable & washable! Perfect customer service experience. Shipping and delivery is always a breeze. And that’s why I am a loyal customer and will always support them!

The quality of my mousepad is incredible! The stitching is great, the rubber underside is strong and keeps the mousepad planted, and the quality of the print is incredible. The shipping experience was also great, they provided me with updates and notifications. Overall a very worthwhile purchase.
First time getting mousepad from Deskr. Wasn't a drastic wait but was good. I love the quality of the mousepad. Was 100% worth buying in my opinion.

Review.Titre: My son wanted a desk pad and has done…
Review.Contenu: My son wanted a desk pad and has done for ages.  I have previously said no due to high shipping costs to the UK.  That changed recently so I relented.  There is no issues with the desk pad (grey mist). High quality and soo comfortable.  The delivery was very slow but when customer services were contacted they sorted it out really quickly.  Their customer service was absolutely top notch.  I will probably buy from them again if the delivery costs stay low.
I made an error in shipping address and customer service was very responsive and helpful

Review.Titre: Very easy to order and shipping was…
Review.Contenu: Very easy to order and shipping was very fast! The desk mat is HUGE and amazing quality!
Had no problems with delivery, quality, pricing, etc. You get more bang for your buck at Deskr than you do at any other big brand names :)
Great selection of high quality desk pads. The designs you guys have are so cool!

Review.Titre: I had issues with my delivery as my…
Review.Contenu: I had issues with my delivery as my package wasn't getting delivered to the correct address/stolen. With Nabzio's help we figured out the issue and managed to send me a free desk pad due to my inconvenience. Would recommend getting anything from here, comes in great quality and beautiful desk pad's

Review.Titre: My desk mat arrived quickly and came in…
Review.Contenu: My desk mat arrived quickly and came in a great cover for transporting it. I love the way it looks on my desk and the material is thick but soft.

Have been using my deskpad for over a month and it has been the best upgrade for my desk setup when it comes to quality and price. Doesn't even compare to my previous mousepad which was much thinner and made out of poor quality rubber. Look forward to more designs in the future and will recommend to friends and family.

Review.Titre: Really good quality and great customer…
Review.Contenu: Really good quality and great customer service !We had issue with shipping as it seemed to being lost but the company sorted everything out as soon as I have contacted them ! They even made sure my son will get his present on time and sent the replacement with extra fast shipping so we received it in 5 days just on his birthday ☺️

I always like to see and feel a product before buying but I took the chance with Deskr and I am beyond satisfied! I got the white topo canyon and the Caribbean deskpad. Both are phenomenal! The quality is solid and makes my desk look complete.I highly recommend going with them!

Amazing quality desk pads! Love the desk pads and the variety in designs really sets the aesthetic for a workspace. The size and dimensions are also great! Service was timely and delivery was efficient and quick. Will be ordering more products!

Amazing deskpads. The quality is insane I bought 6 because I love the designs and craftsmanship. I highly recommend purchasing one if you’re into gaming or just want a desk pad for work. Can’t wait what the drop next. :))
lmfaoo guys they're honestly worth the money, very high quality and brings out your setup especially if you have a white desk

I was browsing around for desk pads and I landed on their page. I opened up TikTok and Instagram to do a quick research to see if they are legit. Not only are they legit, but those designs were sick. I ordered a few designs for my office and work space. They are great quality and really easy to clean up. I have and will continue to recommend this brand to others, their quality speaks for itself.

Review.Titre: Some of the best artisan mouse pad designs!
Review.Contenu: I have a mouse pad from Deskr and I think the quality is absolutely superior. Feels very soft to touch and allows my mouse to glide and move smoothly. As a gamer, this is a necessity for me. Now for the design, I have the topograph one and it gives my set up a very modernistic look which I love. So all in all, best mousepad ever!
Experience was great, very thorough with keeping me posted, although, the spam is a bit annoying now. Something like 15 emails in the past two weeks with my order, and all the bonus emails.

Review.Titre: I really like their mousepads and key…
Review.Contenu: I really like their mousepads and key caps. The designs on the mousepads especially are just amazing I have one of the mousepads and it’s amazing it’s really smooth when I’m playing on my PC. If you’re into gaming and you want a really good mousepad that is smooth Deskr has the best ones. Can’t wait for next ones!!!
Social media response was fast and very friendly! Shipping was fast and quality of my product was amazing! Will be ordering again sometime!
The quality of their products is amazing, and the price is very reasonable in comparison with other brands. The shipping was quick and the team was really helpful!  I would definitely buy again!
Packaging was great, love that the mousepad was in a protective sleeve. The package came quickly as well. The desk pad itself is so pretty and smooth material. The size is perfect for my larger desk!
Great product.   Fast service.
The material feels very durable, it doesn’t slip (very “grippy”), and I love the design.Perfect for what I need.Would recommend.
Awesome caps, and an excellent desk mat. The matching caps and mat make me smile everytime I use/walk past my battlestation. I will and have bought more from Deskr, they're all around very quality.
Love my desk pad! The quality of this product is unmatched and the service is incredible and very quick! Will definitely be buying more products from them!

I LOVE the quality of the desk mat and the size! The shipping was smooth and easy… I got it within a week. The best part is I do a lot of arts and crafts on my desk, so I have scraps everywhere but it is breeze to clean up. Hopefully once I upgrade my pc I’ll test it out for gaming. 😊
5 stars! I really liked the quality of the company, the product, and shipping/packaging. I am also glad that they were able to ship to my location too.
Such a good quality product. Worth the money
The quality of these desk pads are just top tier, best desk pad I've ever owned. 100 percent worth the purchase! As well as the design quality print and color contrast! 11/10!!
High quality product, very fast delivery time. When I need another desk mat I know I’ll be coming back

Love these deskpads! They’re great quality! I use them at home and at work. I’ve tried multiple deskpads over the years and these are by far the best! Love their prints! I’m definitely going to buy more and recommend them to everyone!
Great product. Does what it's supposed to do. The only thing is you cannot write on them. You need some type of backer under the paper your writing on.
The best quality I have seen in my life, so far my aiming accuracy has become better

Review.Titre: I have ordered many desk pads from…
Review.Contenu: I have ordered many desk pads from Deskr. Absolutely love their products! Totally worth it. Highly recommend as their desk pads are not only top quality they are 100% worth the price.
Easy to order! Best designs out there!Great material on the pad too!Cannot wait to order more!

Ordered a desk pad from them, the build quality seems very good so far, the product is quite elegant and aesthetically pleasing (which is why I went to them in the first place), and their customer service was quite helpful within their ability when I encountered an issue with shipping.

Review.Titre: Ordered the mystery desk mat and am…
Review.Contenu: Ordered the mystery desk mat and am happy with the product! Doesn't feel cheap and is making the deal look much better.
Quickly made and shipped. Good quality materials and print quality.
The desk mat is great, it's very good quality and I'm very satisfied
I Purchased two desk pad, fast delivery and premium quality product, would highly recommended
The quality is top notch. I look forward to buying more from here for our business.

Review.Contenu: Takes a bit to get internationally but a good quality product
Great product and above and beyond customer support!!
Quality products! I ended up buy 2 desk mats because of how amazing they are

Review.Contenu: The Desk Matt I ordered is beautiful. Shipping was fast.
Amazing! Perfect !
love my deskpad it makes my whole setup come together. new a new keyboard though
The quality of the desk may was too notch! It is thick, smooth, and feels squishy yet firm enough to play fps!
Amazing, great stitching my mouse have good glide and it grips on the desk
